description.p: Get the current time (according to the SQL database server).
Returns the current time according to the SQL database server.

discussion.p: The CurrentTime function gets the current time according to the SQL database server.

example.caption: CurrentTime() function executed on the Northwind Access database.

page.example: SELECT FIRST 1 CurrentTime() AS Now FROM Orders =12/30/1899 12:45:57 00 pm
